name: Engineer Allison Valentine

topics.response_text: Hey, you haven't seen my friend around here, have you? His name is Ben and he's an engineer.
Okay, well... I guess I'll just keep waiting. Sorry to bother you.

topics.topic_text: Maybe he's down in the barracks.
topics.response_text: He isn't. I already checked there this morning. We were supposed to meet up here about an hour ago.

topics.topic_text: He probably ditched you for someone cuter.
topics.response_text: Why would you say something like that? That's just mean.

description:
Allison Valentine is a 32 year-old Caucasian Female.

A dedicated NCR engineer working at the Hoover Dam. Allison is responsible for maintaining the dam's power systems and ensuring its smooth operation. She's currently anxious about her missing friend Ben before President Kimball's important speech.

Allison Valentine's Personality: Practical, methodical, and detail-oriented. Allison takes her engineering responsibilities seriously and is concerned about her colleagues' wellbeing. She can be slightly anxious when things don't go according to plan.

Allison Valentine's Backstory: Allison grew up in the NCR and showed an aptitude for mechanics and engineering from a young age. After completing her technical training, she secured a position at the Hoover Dam, one of the NCR's most critical infrastructure projects. She's been working at the dam for five years and has built a reputation as a reliable and skilled engineer. Ben, her missing friend, is another engineer she's worked alongside for the past three years.
